name: Batter Up
description:
A game where you flip as many pancakes as you can into the trash cans! You start with a time limit and each player is tasked with flipping pancakes that spawn above the pan to increase their score. Whoever flips the most pancakes in the bins wins!

Controls for the pan:
Computer: WASD To move pan Space to Start
Controller: D-Pad To move pan Bottom Button to Start

https://ian-weaver.itch.io/

https://cameronallen.itch.io/
